answers.answer: Hi Mammow,Welcome to the Pain Management Forum. I am sorry to hear about your painful lower extremities. How long has this been happening? Do you have any redness or swelling?Several possibilities come to mind but without a bit more information I hate to make a wild guess. I assume you are an adult. Do you participate in any sports activities or similar activities? Do you have diabetes?I'll await your response.Take Care,~Tuck

This was happening to me and drove me crazy, i has labs done and found out that my B12 was so low that it started causing me to have neurological problems. So now you can buy liquid B12 it is a dropper and you drop it under you tongue.  You do it this was so it gets into your system faster than pills and I tell you what I haven't had any spasms leg pain, hair is getting thicker and longer though.

question: What can cause extreme burning pain in ankles and lower leg.  This pain wakes me from a sound sleep and I have to get up and put cold compresses on my ankles and legs in order to go back to sleep.  This can happen two or three times a night.
title: ankle and leg pain
